name: F.P.S.P (First Person Shooter Parkour)
description:
--------------------------------------

This is a first person shooter game that revolves around parkour. Through the use of fun mechanics such as wall-running, shotgun jumping & even bhopping, your goal is to finish all of the levels.  Finish the final level (the course on sandbox 2) to receive a special reward that can only be required by the best gamers!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Background info:

This is a game I made as a school project for my design class. I have spent a month and a half on it. It is a First Person Shooter Parkour game "F.P.S.P"! There are five different levels, six including the tutorial.

Have fun through the games variety of fun and awesome game mechanics such as wall-running, sliding, bhopping & shotgun jumping :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keybinds:

W - Move Forward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

S - Move Backwards

SpaceBar - Jump

Mouse - Look around

LShift - Slide. (Note: You need momentum to perform this action)

W + A - WallRun on left walls

W + D -  WallRun on right walls

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Versions / Updates:

(Current version) v1.1: Official released game.

v2.1: Addition of sound effects to the game. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Download:

For Windows:

  1. Download using the link below
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Open the folder
  4. Finally, double click on the file called "Design fps game 4.0.exe" (Ignore the other files in the folder)
  5. Have fun and enjoy the game :) 

For Mac:

  1. Download the file using the link below
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Right click > Open 
  4. Have fun and enjoy the game :)

If there is a problem unzipping the file, use another program to unzip instead of the default mac program.
